examples.example: 他的身高已经超过了一米八，看起来非常挺拔。

translate.english: His height has exceeded 1.8 meters and he looks very tall and straight.

examples.example: 从这里到那棵树大概有一米的距离，我很快就能走过去。

translate.english: It is about one meter from here to that tree, and I can walk there quickly.

examples.example: 我每天都会沿着湖边跑一米，坚持锻炼身体。

translate.english: I will run one meter along the lake every day and keep on exercising.
